A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never been more disappointed by a film in my life. I feel like the only people that liked this movie are people who aren't really Star Wars fans. It lacked any  progression on the over arching plot opting to spit in the face of long time fans instead. The First Order was hard to take seriously as if they were walking in clown shoes the whole movie.  The best part of the movie was the long drawn out sub plot with Finn and Rose. It felt the most like Star Wars to me. It was still bad\, because it was too long and meant nothing to the plot\, but it felt like the spirit of Star Wars to me. Other than that the rest of the movie was just a slap in the face. I can't believe you had Luke milk a muppet......
